channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Britcoin will not replace cash, BOE Governor Bailey says
item.description: Work has started on a digital version of the pound, dubbed Britcoin, but the BOE has yet to decide whether to launch one.

item.title: Climate-change risks have some retirees asking: Is anywhere safe to retire now?
Gelato Godfather: Inside the Sicilian ice cream empire built on mafia money
item.description: Over two-thirds of mafia infiltrations are in the construction, trade, real estate and manufacturing sectors.

item.title: Trump, Harris tied with 49% each in new national Emerson poll
item.description: The latest poll shows a slight change from early October, when Harris had 50% support among likely voters compared with Trump’s 48%.

item.title: AI is being used to send some households impacted by Helene and Milton $1,000 cash relief payments
item.description: The nonprofit GiveDirectly harnesses a Google-developed AI tool to pinpoint areas with high concentrations of poverty and storm damage.

item.title: Delta sues cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike over tech outage that canceled flights
Ex-Moody’s lawyer made $54 million and didn’t file taxes. He’s going to prison.
US approves sale of this advanced missile defense system to Taiwan in $2 billion arms package
item.description: The potential sales package includes three National Advanced Surface-to-Air Missile Systems (NASAMS) and related equipment.

item.title: Elon Musk’s wealth sees record two-day swell as Tesla’s stock surges
Israeli military launches strikes on military targets in Iran, officials say
